examples: He was arrested on suspicion of murder.
My worst suspicions were confirmed.
I have my suspicions about his motives.
He seems to have escaped suspicion.
Suspicion is a heavy armour.
The finger of suspicion points at / to you.
Then suspicion clouded his face.
The local people viewed newcomers with suspicion.
He was arrested on suspicion (on a charge) of murder.
There has long been a suspicion that the painting is a fake.
He'd been trying to divert suspicion away from himself.
His story has raised some suspicion.
The note aroused her suspicions that he was having an affair.
Most of them have no beard at all., others just a suspicion of one.
The plan was regarded with considerable suspicion.
Smith was booked on suspicion of attempted murder.
Local people regard the police with suspicion and distrust.
He is the kind of guy who truckles to anyone who has even a suspicion of money.
He left the company under a cloud of suspicion.
Several members of the court were under suspicion.
He tried not to do anything to excite the suspicion of the police.
The doctor had not the least suspicion of the farce that was playing.

Местные жители глядели на приезжих с подозрением.
